name: round
description: Round faces have equal width and length with soft, curved features.
characteristics: Full cheeks, rounded jawline, wider forehead, soft facial features

name: square
description: Square faces have strong jawlines and equal width and length.
characteristics: Strong jawline, equal width and length, broad forehead, angular features

name: oval
description: Oval faces are longer than they are wide with balanced proportions.
characteristics: Longer face shape, balanced width and length, tapered jawline

name: heart
description: Heart faces are wider at the forehead and narrower at the chin.
characteristics: Wider forehead, narrower jawline, pointed chin, prominent cheekbones

name: oblong
description: Oblong faces are longer than they are wide with a longer jawline.
characteristics: Long face shape, narrow width, elongated jawline, prominent chin

name: diamond
description: Diamond faces are wider at the cheekbones with a narrow forehead and chin.
characteristics: Prominent cheekbones, narrow forehead, narrow chin, angular features

name: triangle
description: Triangle faces are wider at the jawline and narrower at the forehead.
characteristics: Wider jawline, narrow forehead, prominent chin, angular jaw
